application.controller

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.controller.LoginController

  • public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class that handles the events associated with the Login page.

    • Method Detail

      • loginClicked

        public void loginClicked(javafx.event.Event event)
        Verifies that the given username and password are valid. If so, it changes the current view to the Kiosk, Admin, or Employee page based on the given input.
        Parameters:
        event - The Login button is clicked.

      • createNewAccountClicked

        public void createNewAccountClicked(javafx.event.Event event)
        Creates a new account based on the username and password that the new user enters. Verifies that the data is valid and that it doesn't match that of an existing account.
        Parameters:
        event - The "Create New Account" button on the account creation page is clicked.

      • createNewAccountPromptClicked

        public void createNewAccountPromptClicked(javafx.event.Event event)
        Prompt for new users; directs them to the account creation page.
        Parameters:
        event - The "Create New Account Prompt" button on the Login page is clicked.

      • buttonBackClicked

        public void buttonBackClicked(javafx.event.Event event)
        Reverts from the "Create New Account" page to the Login page.
        Parameters:
        event - The Back button is clicked.

      • getIDCurrentNumberOfAccounts

        public int getIDCurrentNumberOfAccounts()
        Checks the current set of account IDs. Creates a new account ID.
        Returns:
        num A new account ID that is the current largest ID incremented.
